```{r}
Task2 <- function(Table, GeneSet, Name) {
  
  variant.per.gene_set.per.sample <- Table %>%
    filter(gene %in% Set) %>%
    summarise(across(2:ncol(Table),sum)) %>%
    pivot_longer( everything(), names_to = "sampleID", values_to = Name)

  return(variant.per.gene_set.per.sample)
}
```
